attributes.action: To give amnesty to undocumented migrants in UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The coronavirus pandemic is a serious crisis, undocumented migrants are very unlikely to approach the NHS if infected, hence the danger of spreading the virus due to this fear is significant.

As a country that cares so much about our public health, it is important that the government give amnesty to the undocumented migrants so that they can be willing to report coronavirus infection without a fear of being deported.
attributes.background: To offer undocumented migrants without criminal records the right to live and work in the UK.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312998

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
